thread.title: Usain Bolt compares his football ability to a Man United legend (video)
thread.title_full: Usain Bolt compares his football ability to a Man United legend (video)

author: Ben Green
title: Usain Bolt compares his football ability to a Man United legend (video)
text:
Usain Bolt compares his football ability to a Man United legend (video) By Ben Green   Usain Bolt really wants to be a professional footballer! 
Having tasted so much success at the Olympics, Usain Bolt continues to push on a public level to play for Manchester United. 
Bolt has been vociferous in his support for Manchester United, most famously during the reigns of David Moyes and Louis van Gaal, when the football was not so great to watch. 
Ever since his personal success at the Olympics in Rio, Bolt has confirmed that he will be training with Borussia Dortmund, as he does on the video below. “Wayne Rooney’s level” 
But, that arrangement appears to have been pushed by the sponsors of both Bolt and Dortmund: Puma. 
Usain Bolt spoke at the Laureus World Sports Awards in Monaco on Tuesday (14th February), where he repeated his desire to play football at a professional level. 
Bolt won sportsman of the year and was asked how good he is at football. 
When pushed on his level, Bolt claimed he was at “Wayne Rooney’s level”. 
Perhaps some Manchester United fans would agree with this assessment right now. But, Rooney is the all-time top goal scorer for his club side and England!
